edu.utsa.mobbed

Class ManageDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.utsa.mobbed.ManageDB

  • public class ManageDB
extends java.lang.Object
    Handler class for MOBBED database. This handler can be used to update, insert, and query the database.
    Author:
    Arif Hossain, Jeremy Cockfield, Kay Robbins

    • Constructor Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • ManageDB

        public ManageDB(java.lang.String dbname,
        java.lang.String hostname,
        java.lang.String username,
        java.lang.String password,
        boolean verbose)
         throws MobbedException
        Creates a ManageDB object.
        Parameters:
        dbname - the name of the database
        hostname - the host name of the database
        username - the user name of the database
        password - the password of the database
        verbose - prints informative messages if true
        Throws:
        MobbedException - if an error occurs

    • Method Detail

      • addRows

        public java.lang.String[] addRows(java.lang.String table,
                         java.lang.String[] columns,
                         java.lang.String[][] values,
                         java.lang.String[] doubleColumns,
                         java.lang.Double[][] doubleValues)
                           throws MobbedException
        Inserts or updates rows in the database. To insert rows, do not assign values to the key columns. To update rows, assign values to the key columns that already exist in the database.
        Parameters:
        table - the name of the database table
        columns - the names of the non-double database columns
        values - the values of the non-double database columns
        doubleColumns - the names of the double database columns database table
        doubleValues - the values of the double database columns
        Returns:
        the keys of the database rows that were inserted and/or updated
        Throws:
        MobbedException - if an error occurs

      • checkDatasetVersion

        public int checkDatasetVersion(boolean isUnique,
                      java.lang.String namespace,
                      java.lang.String name)
                        throws MobbedException
        Checks the dataset namespace and name combination. If isUnique is set to true and the combination already exist then an exception will be thrown. If isUnique is false and the combination already exist then the dataset version will be incremented signifying a duplicate dataset.
        Parameters:
        isUnique - if the dataset namespace and name combination is unique combination
        datasetName - the name of the dataset
        datasetNamespace - the namespace of the dataset
        Returns:
        the version number of the dataset
        Throws:
        MobbedException - if an error occurs

           throws MobbedException

        Throws:
        MobbedException - if an error occurs

        Throws:

      • retrieveRows

        public java.lang.String[][] retrieveRows(java.lang.String table,
                                double limit,
                                java.lang.String regExp,
                                java.lang.String[][] tags,
                                java.lang.String[][] attributes,
                                java.lang.String[] columns,
                                java.lang.String[][] values,
                                java.lang.String[] doubleColumns,
                                java.lang.Double[][] doubleValues,
                                double[][] range,
                                java.lang.String cursorName)
                                  throws MobbedException
        Retrieves rows from the database based on search criteria
        Parameters:
        table - the name of the database table
        limit - the maximum number of rows to retrieve
        regExp -
        tags - the tags search criteria
        attributes - the attributes search criteria
        columns - the names of the non-double database columns
        values - the values of the non-double database columns
        doubleColumns - the names of the double database columns
        doubleValues - the values of the double database columns
        range - the range to search by double database columns
        cursorName - the name of the data cursor
        Returns:
        the rows found by the search criteria
        Throws:
        MobbedException - if an error occurs

      • rollback

        public void rollback()
              throws MobbedException
        Rollback the current transaction. Auto commit mode needs to be set to false to create a transaction.
        Throws:
        MobbedException - if an error occurs

      • setAutoCommit

        public void setAutoCommit(boolean autoCommit)
                   throws MobbedException
        Sets the auto commit mode of the connection.
        Parameters:
        autoCommit - true to enable autocommit mode, false to disable it
        Throws:
        MobbedException - if an error occurs

      • createCredentials

        public static void createCredentials(java.lang.String filename,
                     java.lang.String dbname,
                     java.lang.String hostname,
                     java.lang.String username,
                     java.lang.String password)
                              throws MobbedException
        Stores the database credentials in a property file. Call loadCredentials to get the database credentials back.
        Parameters:
        filename - the filename of the property file
        dbname - the name of the database
        hostname - the host name of the database
        username - the user name of the database
        password - the password of the database
        Throws:
        MobbedException - if an error occurs

      • createDatabase

        public static void createDatabase(java.lang.String dbname,
                  java.lang.String hostname,
                  java.lang.String username,
                  java.lang.String password,
                  java.lang.String filename,
                  boolean verbose)
                           throws MobbedException
        Creates and populates a database. The database must not already exist to create it. The database will be created from a valid SQL file.
        Parameters:
        dbname - the name of the database
        hostname - the host name of the database
        username - the user name of the database
        password - the password of the database
        filename - the name of the sql file
        verbose - prints informative messages if true
        Throws:
        MobbedException - if an error occurs

      • deleteDatabase

        public static void deleteDatabase(java.lang.String dbname,
                  java.lang.String hostname,
                  java.lang.String username,
                  java.lang.String password,
                  boolean verbose)
                           throws MobbedException
        Deletes the database and all objects associated with oids. The database must already exist to delete it. There must be no active connections to delete the database.
        Parameters:
        dbname - the name of the database
        hostname - the host name of the database
        username - the user name of the database
        password - the password of the database
        verbose - prints informative messages if true
        Throws:
        MobbedException - if an error occurs

      • executeSQL

        public static void executeSQL(java.sql.Connection dbCon,
              java.lang.String statement)
                       throws MobbedException
        Executes a SQL statement. The sql statement must be valid or an exception will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        dbCon - a connection to the database
        statement - the sql statement to be executed
        Throws:
        MobbedException - if an error occurs

      • loadCredentials

        public static java.lang.String[] loadCredentials(java.lang.String filename)
                                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Loads the database credentials from a property file. The credentials will be stored in a array.
        Parameters:
        filename - the name of the property file
        Returns:
        an array that contains the database credentials
        Throws:
        MobbedException - if an error occurs
        java.lang.Exception
